From:

(USANYS)" 
yl < 
SANYS 
Contractor]" 
Subject: Re: Sunday Times news story on Ghislaine Maxwell federal indictment 
Date: Fri, 24 Jul 2020 21:38:12 +0000 
Sure. I'm at if you want to call. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 24, 2020, at 5:17 PM, > wrote: 
Hi Mâ€” if you haven't yet spoken with this person, do you have a quick minute to discuss? I just wanted to 
make clear that we have not in any way made public the identity of Victim 3, so I'm not sure what the ethical 
basis would be for any reporter to claim to know who this person is. Thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 24, 2020, at 1:55 PM, 
I'll respond. Thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 24, 2020, at 1:35 PM, 
(USANYS) > 
wrote: 
> wrote: 
I'm passing this on per our usual policy of forwarding all contacts from the press. 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: "Gadher, Dipesh" 
Date: July 24, 2020 at 12:55:30 PM EDT 
To: 
Subject: Sunday Times news story on Ghislaine Maxwell federal indictment 
Dear and 
Sony to contact you out of the blue, but I've been working on the Ghislaine Maxwell sex trafficking 
charges story for The Sunday Times newspaper in London over the past few weeks. 
The federal indictment highlights three specific victims, identified as Minor Victim 1, 2 and 3. 
EFTA00021938

I believe that "Minor Victim 3" is a British-born woman called and plan to state this 
in a news story on Sunday. She previously waived her right of anonymity at a court hearing attended by 
victims of Jeffrey Epstein in New York last August and subsequently appeared on the NBC Dateline show. 
Can you or one of your collea ues lease urgently let me know if there are any legal issues that would 
prevent me from naming Ms as a key witness in this case? 
Do prosecutors plan to publicly identify Ms Maxwell's victims at any point? If so, when? 
I can be contacted via email or on . My deadline is 10pm GMT today. 
Many thanks for your time and help. 
Best wishes 
Dipesh Gadher 
Home Affairs Correspondent 
The Sunday Times 
London 
SE1 9GF 
Tel: 
Mob: 
"Please consider the environment before printing this e-mail"

EFTA00021939
